refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: make_string returns a new string of length count, filled with binary zeros.
If count is zero, an empty string '' is returned.

refsect2.title: count
refsect2.para: Length of the string to be generated.

refsect1.title: Return Values
refsect1.para: A string with defined length is returned.

example.title: Using make_string and aref
example.para: Make a string and fill it with character sequence containing the alphabet upper case characters from A to Z.
